alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 12:09AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central and eastern Chautauqua County through 100 AM EDT... At 1205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over central Chautauqua County, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding possible in low lying and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Westfield, Lakewood, Falconer, Mayville, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, SUNY Fredonia, Frewsburg, Chautauqua, Busti, Portland, Sheridan, Stockton, Gerry and Ellington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 59. Interstate 86 between exits 7 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
